body:
Comment 3: 
We could have a go.crypto/keyformats package, but what would it contain? ASN.1 based
keys are in crypto/x509 and are needed as part of the base libs. Other than that,
there's SSH and OpenPGP key formats and I can't really think of much else.

The SSH and OpenPGP code is both pretty well embedded in their respective packages and
pulling that code into a keyformats package doesn't appeal.

So I think that, if parsePubKey is needed, the least bad option is for ssh to export it.
